Description: Up for sale is a Dean Vendetta guitar with lic. Floyd Rose tremelo, coil tap pickups, and it comes with a tremelo bar and gig bag.This Dean Vendetta plays well, sounds great and I like that the tone knob is push push, which allows you to switch either one of the pickups from dual coil humbucker, to single coil...This is a very versatile guitar with a wide range of sound combinations.This Dean Vendetta is completely stock except the original tremelo had problems with the g string saddle not holding onto the string, so i changed out the tremelo for a new lic. Floyd Rose and it works just fine now.This Dean Vendetta is in clean condition and it has a carved arched figured wood top and is nice looking, as can be seen in the pics. To the winning bidder:This guitar will be well packed and fully insured, all in an effort to make sure it gets to you safe and sound.Happy bidding! Info and specs below: The Dean Vendetta 1000 electric guitar's feature set includes dual Dean DMT humbuckers, a 25.5" scale, and a solid basswood body with a solid flamed maple top. A bolt-on maple neck has a fast, comfortable C-shape and is paired with a 24-fret rosewood fingerboard. The Dean Vendetta guitar sports black hardware including reliable sealed tuners, and a Floyd Rose Special tremolo bridge, with a locking nut (replaced with a licensed Floyd rose). Powerful Dean USA DMT Design humbuckers with push-pull coil-splitting faithfully carry every shred and crunch to your amp. Case sold separately. Vendetta double-cutaway body style Flamed maple top Basswood body 25-1/2" scale Bolt-on C-shaped maple neck 24-fret rosewood fingerboard Sealed tuners 1-11/16" locking nut Black chrome hardware Floyd Rose Special tremolo bridge (replaced with a licensed Floyd rose) DMT Design humbucker pickups with push-pull coil splitting Volume, tone, and 3-way selector switch Guitar case sold separately
Title: Dean Vendetta 1000FR guitar with lic. Floyd Rose, coil tap pickups, and gig bag.
ConditionDescription: In nice condition and it plays and sounds great too.
